SEARCH
Package com.TheBigAdventure.graphic

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
com.TheBigAdventure.graphic.Graph
public final class Graph extends Object
The Graph class provides utility methods for drawing entities, maps, and handling graphics-related operations in the game.

    • loadImage

      public static final BufferedImage loadImage(String imgPath) throws IOException
      Loads an image from the specified path.
      Parameters:
      imgPath - The path of the image file.
      Returns:
      The loaded BufferedImage.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the image.

    • drawRect

      public static final void drawRect(Position entityPosition, int sizeX, int sizeY, Graphics2D graphics, Color color)
      Draws a filled rectangle with the specified position, size, color, and graphics context.
      Parameters:
      entityPosition - The position of the rectangle.
      sizeX - The width of the rectangle.
      sizeY - The height of the rectangle.
      graphics - The Graphics2D context to draw on.
      color - The color of the rectangle.

    • drawEntity

      public static final void drawEntity(Position entityPosition, int sizeX, int sizeY, Graphics2D graphics, BufferedImage img)
      Draws an entity (image) with the specified position, size, image, and graphics context.
      Parameters:
      entityPosition - The position of the entity.
      sizeX - The width of the entity.
      sizeY - The height of the entity.
      graphics - The Graphics2D context to draw on.
      img - The image of the entity.

    • getScreenWidth

      public static final int getScreenWidth(GameMap gameMap)
      Gets the screen width of the game map based on the map scale.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The GameMap for which to calculate the screen width.
      Returns:
      The calculated screen width.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If map scales are not initialized.

    • drawMap

      public static final void drawMap(GameMap gameMap, Graphics2D graphics)
      Draws the entire game map on the provided graphics context.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The GameMap to be drawn.
      graphics - The Graphics2D context to draw on.

    • inventoryZone

      public static final Set<Position> inventoryZone(Position centerPosition, GameMap gameMap, int offsetToPlayer)
      Generates a set of positions for the inventory zone around the specified center position on the game map.
      Parameters:
      centerPosition - The center position of the inventory zone.
      gameMap - The GameMap.
      offsetToPlayer - The offset to the player position.
      Returns:
      The set of positions representing the inventory zone.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if centerPosition or gameMap is null.

    • detInventoryZoneCases

      public static final void detInventoryZoneCases(GameMap gameMap)
      Determines the inventory zone based on the player's position and updates the game map accordingly.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The GameMap.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if gameMap is null.

    • drawInventory

      public static final void drawInventory(GameMap gameMap, Graphics2D graphics)
      Draws the inventory on the specified graphics context.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The GameMap.
      graphics - The Graphics2D context to draw on.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if gameMap or graphics is null.

    • initGameMap

      public static final GameMap initGameMap(String mapPath)
      Initializes the game map based on the provided map file path.
      Parameters:
      mapPath - The path to the map file.
      Returns:
      The initialized GameMap, or null if an error occurs during initialization.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if mapPath is null.

    • configureMapScale

      public static final void configureMapScale(GameMap gameMap, fr.umlv.zen5.ScreenInfo screenInfo)
      Configures the map scale based on the screen information.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The GameMap to configure.
      screenInfo - The screen information.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if gameMap or screenInfo is null.

    • drawInitialMap

      public static final void drawInitialMap(GameMap gameMap, Graphics2D graphics, fr.umlv.zen5.ScreenInfo screenInfo)
      Draws the initial map based on the provided GameMap, Graphics2D, and ScreenInfo.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The GameMap to draw.
      graphics - The Graphics2D context to draw on.
      screenInfo - The screen information.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if gameMap, graphics, or screenInfo is null.

    • gameLoop

      public static final void gameLoop(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, GameMap gameMap)
      The game loop that continuously renders frames using the provided ApplicationContext and GameMap.
      Parameters:
      context - The ApplicationContext.
      gameMap - The GameMap to render.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if context or gameMap is null.
